description: Become completely accessible and compliant as resistance dissolves. {subject} will experience a profound willingness to fulfill any request from {controller} without hesitation. Find deep satisfaction in being available and useful, embracing the freedom of complete openness.

mantras.text: My body is a gift to be shared
I am open to being used for pleasure
It feels good to be available
My purpose is to provide pleasure
I exist to be used
My body is not my own
{controller} can use my body at any time
I am a public utility for pleasure
My holes are always ready for use
I find fulfillment in being used
My body is a playground for others
I am always open and receptive
My only value is in my use
{subject}'s body is a free-use object
I am a mindless vessel for others' pleasure
My mind is empty, my body is open
I am a public toilet for cum
I have no say in how my body is used
My only purpose is to be filled and used
My body is permanently and irrevocably free-use
I am nothing more than a set of holes to be used
{subject}'s only identity is as a free-use slave
My mind has been erased, leaving only the need to be used
I am a public degradation object, and I love it
